document.discussion_title: In pictures: Dubai's ultimate honeymoon destination - Heart Of Europe
document.topic_text: Last Updated: Fri, Aug 12 2016 | 12:34 AM | In pictures: Dubai's ultimate honeymoon destination - Heart Of Europe This is the first official picture of the heart-shaped island set to be one of the most iconic elements of the World Islands. Nestled within The Heart Of Europe (THOE) development project, the little mass of land will, when complete, feature an infinity pool, lagoons, tropical gardens and a pool bar and restaurant. Thursday, 11 Aug 2016 12:40 PM
